MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the LL29 postcode area of Colwyn Bay. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:10am. Our engineers have arrived onsite at Hillside Road and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:15am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:26am on 15th January
